title: Expert: XRP to Hit $10 In No Time If This Is Approved
body: Ripple’s ongoing push into regulated finance has taken a decisive turn. The company’s long-awaited application for a national trust bank charter with the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) is in the public review phase, marking a key moment in its expansion into traditional financial infrastructure. The company plans to launch the Ripple National Trust Bank . The filing positions the company to operate under federal banking oversight if approved. The move has generated renewed optimism among XRP supporters who see the development as a potential game-changer for the digital asset’s market trajectory. Crypto analyst Steph Is Crypto (@Steph_iscrypto) stated on X that XRP could rise to $10 in no time if Ripple’s application is approved. The comment encapsulates the sentiment that a successful charter could significantly strengthen XRP’s credibility and utility in the financial system. REMINDER: RIPPLE’S OCC BANKING LICENSE APPLICATION IS NOW PUBLIC — “RIPPLE NATIONAL TRUST BANK” ENTERS REVIEW PHASE. $XRP TO $10 IN NO TIME IF APPROVED! pic.twitter.com/tuSm8gvkh6 — STEPH IS CRYPTO (@Steph_iscrypto) October 27, 2025 A Strategic Step Toward Banking Integration Ripple’s application aims to establish a federally chartered trust bank that would allow it to provide custody and fiduciary services, manage digital asset reserves, and potentially gain access to Federal Reserve payment rails through a master account. This structure could allow Ripple to handle RLUSD under direct federal supervision, reducing its dependence on third-party financial intermediaries. Such access to established banking infrastructure would give Ripple the ability to bridge digital and traditional finance within a regulated framework. The company’s focus on institutional-grade financial services aligns with its strategy to use the XRP Ledger for cross-border transactions and liquidity management. Why Approval Could Boost XRP A federally approved trust bank could enhance XRP’s standing among institutional players. By operating within a regulated banking environment, Ripple would gain a level of credibility rarely afforded to crypto-focused entities. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 This validation could drive greater adoption of XRP for payment settlement and liquidity provision, strengthening its fundamental use case. If Ripple secures the charter, the company could integrate XRP more deeply into its payment ecosystem, potentially increasing transactional demand for the token. The Path Ahead for XRP Ripple’s pursuit of federal oversight signals its intent to operate within the framework of U.S. financial law, which could help the company avoid regulatory uncertainty similar to its prolonged legal battle with the SEC that hindered XRP’s growth. The outcome of this application will significantly impact investor confidence and market sentiment regarding XRP. If the charter is approved, Ripple’s strengthened regulatory position may provide the foundation that analysts like Steph Is Crypto believe could send the asset toward the $10 mark. title: ตลาดโล่ง! Mt. Gox เลื่อนคืน Bitcoin มูลค่า 4 พันล้านดอลลาร์
body: Mt. Gox อดีตกระดานเทรดคริปโตชื่อดัง ได้ประกาศเลื่อนการชำระคืน Bitcoin ให้แก่เจ้าหนี้ออกไปอีกหนึ่งปีจนถึงเดือนตุลาคม 2026 ซึ่งการตัดสินใจครั้งนี้ได้ล็อก Bitcoin มูลค่ากว่า 4 พันล้านดอลลาร์ไว้ไม่ให้เข้าสู่ตลาด คำถามสำคัญคือนี่เป็นข่าวดีหรือข่าวร้ายสำหรับราคา Bitcoin ในอนาคต? นักวิเคราะห์หลายคนมองว่านี่อาจเป็นสัญญาณบวกที่ช่วยลดแรงกดดันในการเทขายครั้งใหญ่ วิเคราะห์ตลาด Bitcoin แกร่งเกินคาด! ดูดซับแรงเทขาย Mt. Gox สำเร็จ ข้อมูลจาก Arkham Intelligence เผยว่ากองทรัสต์ของ Mt. Gox ได้ทยอยคืน Bitcoin ให้เจ้าหนี้ไปแล้วประมาณ 75% ของทั้งหมดนับตั้งแต่ช่วงกลางปี 2024 ทำให้ยอดคงเหลือลดลงจาก 142,000 BTC เหลือเพียง 34,690 BTC ซึ่งหมายความว่ามี Bitcoin มูลค่ากว่า 12,000 ล้านดอลลาร์ถูกปล่อยสู่ตลาดแล้ว แต่กลับไม่สามารถกดราคาลงได้ สิ่งที่น่าสนใจคือ นับตั้งแต่เริ่มมีการชำระคืน ราคา Bitcoin กลับพุ่งสูงขึ้นถึง 85% สะท้อนให้เห็นว่าตลาดมีความต้องการซื้อที่แข็งแกร่งอย่างมหาศาล ซึ่งสามารถดูดซับแรงเทขายที่เกิดขึ้นได้อย่างง่ายดาย ปัจจัยสำคัญมาจากอุปสงค์ที่ไม่หยุดยั้งของกองทุน US spot Bitcoin ETFs และการที่บริษัทมหาชนเข้าสะสม BTC อย่างต่อเนื่อง อย่างไรก็ตาม สถานการณ์อาจมีความผันผวนได้ในระยะสั้น เนื่องจากมีรายงานเกี่ยวกับ สัญญาณ Bitcoin ETF ที่มีเงินไหลออก ซึ่งอาจสร้างแรงกดดันต่อตลาดได้เป็นครั้งคราว ตัวอย่างที่ชัดเจนคือ MicroStrategy (MSTR) ที่เข้าซื้อ Bitcoin ไปแล้วถึง 414,477 BTC (มูลค่าประมาณ 47,000 ล้านดอลลาร์) ซึ่งมากกว่าจำนวนที่ Mt. Gox คืนให้เจ้าหนี้ถึง 3.9 เท่า แสดงให้เห็นว่าตลาด Bitcoin ในปัจจุบันมีสภาพคล่องและความลึกมากกว่าในอดีตมาก ทำให้การเลื่อนชำระคืน Bitcoin ที่เหลืออีก 4 พันล้านดอลลาร์ออกไปจึงช่วยลดความเสี่ยงจากการเทขายกะทันหัน นอกเหนือจาก MicroStrategy แล้ว ยังมีบริษัทอื่น ๆ ที่แสดงความเชื่อมั่นใน Bitcoin เช่นกัน โดยล่าสุดมีรายงานว่า Metaplanet ใช้ Bitcoin ค้ำประกันเพื่อซื้อหุ้นคืน ซึ่งเป็นการส่งสัญญาณบวกและช่วยดึงความเชื่อมั่นกลับสู่ตลาด ปัจจัยมหภาคหนุน! ราคา Bitcoin จ่อทะยานสู่ $150,000 นักวิเคราะห์สายกระทิงคาดการณ์ว่าราคา Bitcoin มีแนวโน้มเติบโตในระยะยาว โดยมีปัจจัยมหภาคหลายอย่างเป็นแรงหนุนสำคัญที่อาจช่วยลดผลกระทบด้านลบจากการกระจายเหรียญของ Mt. Gox ได้ ประการแรกคือ ตลาดคาดการณ์ว่าธนาคารกลางสหรัฐฯ (Fed) จะปรับลดอัตราดอกเบี้ยหลายครั้ง ซึ่งจะช่วยลดแรงกดดันต่อสินทรัพย์เสี่ยงและเปิดโอกาสให้ราคา Bitcoin พุ่งขึ้นสู่ระดับ 150,000 ดอลลาร์ภายในไม่กี่เดือนข้างหน้า นอกจากนี้ ความคืบหน้าในการเจรจาข้อตกลงทางการค้าระหว่างสหรัฐฯ และจีน ยังช่วยปรับปรุงความเชื่อมั่นของนักลงทุนในตลาดโลก ซึ่งส่งผลดีต่อทั้งตลาดหุ้นและคริปโต ขณะเดียวกัน ปริมาณเงินในระบบ (Global M2 Money Supply) กำลังเร่งตัวขึ้นในอัตราที่เร็วที่สุดนับตั้งแต่ปี 2020 $BTC Global M2 money supply 12-week lead looks very promising and alligns with a green November. Higher in Q4! pic.twitter.com/S9iB8VmuW0 — Crypto Bull (@TheCryptoBull_) October 24, 2025 นักวิเคราะห์ตั้งข้อสังเกตว่า หากราคา Bitcoin เคลื่อนไหวตามแนวโน้มสภาพคล่องที่เพิ่มขึ้นเหมือนช่วงหลังวิกฤตโควิด-19 ก็มีความเป็นไปได้ที่ราคาอาจพุ่งสูงถึง 500,000 ดอลลาร์ภายในปี 2026 ซึ่งจะเป็นการสร้างปรากฏการณ์ขาขึ้นครั้งประวัติศาสตร์อีกครั้ง และด้วยแนวโน้มการเติบโตที่แข็งแกร่งนี้ นักลงทุนจำนวนมากจึงเริ่มมองหา เหรียญคริปโตที่น่าลงทุนสำหรับปี 2025 เพื่อสร้างโอกาสในการเติบโตของพอร์ต Bitcoin Hyper จุดประกายความเชื่อมั่นใหม่ท่ามกลางตลาด BTC ฟื้นตัว การเลื่อนชำระคืนของ Mt. Gox ทำให้แรงเทขายในตลาดลดลงอย่างเห็นได้ชัด ซึ่งส่งผลดีต่อโปรเจกต์อย่าง Bitcoin Hyper (HYPER) ที่กำลังเดินหน้าพัฒนา Layer-2 บนเครือข่าย Bitcoin อย่างเข้มข้น ด้วยกระแสความต้องการสินทรัพย์ที่เชื่อมโยงกับ Bitcoin ทำให้ HYPER กลายเป็นหนึ่งใน เหรียญ Presale ที่น่าจับตา ที่สุดในช่วงปลายปีนี้ แม้ตลาดคริปโตยังคงผันผวน แต่นักลงทุนจำนวนมากมองว่า HYPER มีโอกาสได้รับแรงหนุนจากรอบกระทิงถัดไป โดยเฉพาะเมื่อบล็อกเชน SVM และระบบสะพานข้ามเชนเริ่มเปิดใช้งานเต็มรูปแบบ แรงหนุนจากชุมชนและกลยุทธ์การตลาดเชิงไวรัลยังผลักดันให้ HYPER กลายเป็นหนึ่งใน เหรียญมีมมาแรง ที่สามารถเชื่อมโยงความสนุกเข้ากับเทคโนโลยีจริงได้อย่างลงตัว ถ้าคุณกำลังวางแผนพิจารณา Bitcoin Hyper สามารถอ่าน บทวิเคราะห์ราคา Bitcoin Hyper หรือดู คู่มือวิธีซื้อ Bitcoin Hyper แบบละเอียด เพื่อเสริมความมั่นใจและกำหนดแผนได้แม่นยำขึ้น แวะไปดูรายละเอียดจาก เว็บไซต์ทางการของ Bitcoin Hyper หรือพูดคุยกันต่อใน X และ ช่อง Telegram ไปยัง Bitcoin Hyper

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Plunges Before the FOMC Meeting, Pi Network (PI) Soars by 15%: Market Watch
body: The cryptocurrency market, which started the new business week on the right foot, lost some ground over the past 24 hours. Bitcoin (BTC) briefly dipped to almost $112,000, while Ethereum (ETH) and many other leading altcoins have also posted losses. Pi Network’s PI is in the opposite corner with a double-digit gain. BTC Slips Ahead of Fed’s Decision The primary cryptocurrency registered an impressive uptick on Monday (October 27), temporarily climbing above $116,000. It surpassed that level yesterday, too, but since then, BTC has been in an evident downtrend. Several hours ago, the price tumbled to approximately $112,300. The bulls managed to reclaim some lost ground, and as of this writing, Bitcoin is hovering around $113,000, representing a 1.2% decline on a daily scale. BTC Price, Source: TradingView The heightened volatility comes just hours before the FOMC meeting, during which the Federal Reserve will decide whether to raise, lower, or keep interest rates in the United States unchanged. The odds of a 0.25% drop are almost certain (according to bets on Polymarket), and we will see how the official announcement impacts the crypto sector. According to some analysts, Bitcoin is at a crossroads and its valuation could either shoot above $120,000 or collapse well below $100K. Lower interest rates are generally considered good news for bulls, as they could dampen investor appetite for traditional financial products and encourage investment in digital assets. Following BTC’s price retreat over the past 24 hours, its market capitalization has headed south to around $2.25 trillion, while its dominance over the altcoins stands at nearly 59%. PI Enters Green Territory Ethereum (ETH) has followed BTC’s footsteps, plunging by 3% to under $4,000. Solana (SOL), Bittensor (TAO), Sui (SUI), Hedera (HBAR), and Ethena (ENA) are also among the biggest losers, with declines of 4-7%. Somewhat surprisingly, Pi Network’s native cryptocurrency is the best-performing digital asset (from the top 100 club) today, with its price spiking by 15% to $0.26. Other notable gainers include TRUMP (+13%) and M (+4%). The total cryptocurrency market capitalization has retraced by 1.7% in the last day to around $3.88 trillion. Cryptocurrency Market Overview, Source: QuantifyCrypto The post Bitcoin (BTC) Plunges Before the FOMC Meeting, Pi Network (PI) Soars by 15%: Market Watch appeared first on CryptoPotato .
tags: Crypto News|Market Updates|Top News|Bitcoin (BTC) Price|Pi Network (PI)

title: Algorand Price Prediction 2025-2030: Unlocking ALGO’s Monumental Journey to $1
body: BitcoinWorld Algorand Price Prediction 2025-2030: Unlocking ALGO’s Monumental Journey to $1 Are you curious about the future of Algorand (ALGO)? As the cryptocurrency market continues its dynamic evolution, investors and enthusiasts alike are keen to understand where promising projects like Algorand are headed. This comprehensive guide delves into the Algorand price prediction for 2025, 2026, and all the way to 2030, exploring the factors that could drive or hinder its growth. Will the ALGO price truly reach the ambitious $1 mark? Let’s embark on this analytical journey to uncover the potential trajectory of this innovative blockchain. Understanding Algorand (ALGO): The Foundation of a Digital Economy Before we dive into the numbers, it’s essential to grasp what Algorand is and why it stands out. Algorand is a decentralized, secure, and scalable blockchain network designed to facilitate the future of finance (FutureFi). Founded by Turing Award winner Silvio Micali , it employs a unique Pure Proof-of-Stake (PPoS) consensus mechanism. This mechanism ensures instant transaction finality, high throughput, and robust security, all while maintaining decentralization. Pure Proof-of-Stake: Unlike energy-intensive Proof-of-Work systems, Algorand’s PPoS randomly selects users to propose and validate blocks, making it highly efficient and environmentally friendly. Scalability: Designed for enterprise-level applications, Algorand can process thousands of transactions per second, addressing a key challenge for many older blockchains. Security: Its cryptographic primitives and PPoS design make it highly resistant to attacks, ensuring the integrity of transactions and data. Decentralization: Every ALGO holder has the opportunity to participate in governance and network security, fostering a truly decentralized ecosystem. The Algorand ecosystem continues to grow, attracting developers and projects across DeFi, NFTs, and enterprise solutions. This foundational strength is a critical component in any meaningful ALGO price analysis . Key Drivers Influencing ALGO Price Analysis Predicting cryptocurrency prices is inherently complex, influenced by a multitude of factors. For a robust ALGO price analysis , we must consider both internal network developments and broader market dynamics. What forces are shaping the Algorand future ? Technological Advancements and Ecosystem Growth Algorand’s commitment to innovation plays a significant role. Continuous upgrades, enhanced smart contract capabilities, and developer tools can attract more projects and users, increasing demand for ALGO. Key areas include: DeFi Integration: Growing decentralized finance applications on Algorand drive transaction volume and utility for ALGO. NFTs and Gaming: The platform’s low transaction fees and speed make it attractive for NFT marketplaces and blockchain gaming. State Proofs: Innovations like State Proofs enhance interoperability and cross-chain capabilities, broadening Algorand’s reach. Sustainability: Algorand’s carbon-negative status appeals to environmentally conscious investors and enterprises. Partnerships and Institutional Adoption High-profile partnerships and institutional interest can provide significant boosts. Collaborations with financial institutions, governments, and major corporations validate Algorand’s technology and expand its real-world utility. For instance, Algorand’s partnership with FIFA for its official digital collectibles platform brought considerable attention. Similarly, the growing number of stablecoins, like USDC , choosing Algorand as a base further cements its position. Market Sentiment and Macroeconomic Factors The broader cryptocurrency market trend significantly impacts individual asset prices. A bullish market often lifts all boats, while a bearish trend can suppress even strong projects. Global economic conditions, regulatory developments, and investor sentiment towards risk assets also play a crucial role in the overall Algorand price prediction . Algorand Price Prediction 2025: A Pivotal Year for Growth? As we look towards 2025, several factors suggest a potential for positive movement in the ALGO price . The crypto market often operates in cycles, and 2025 could see the continuation of a bull run initiated by Bitcoin’s halving event in 2024. For Algorand, increased adoption of its technology and growing developer activity will be key drivers. Analyst consensus suggests that if Algorand continues to deliver on its roadmap and attract more decentralized applications (dApps), its utility and demand will naturally increase. We might see the ALGO price ranging between: Minimum Price Average Price Maximum Price $0.35 $0.50 $0.75 These figures are speculative and depend heavily on sustained market momentum and Algorand’s ability to maintain its competitive edge. The increasing number of projects building on Algorand, particularly in real-world asset tokenization and central bank digital currencies (CBDCs), could provide a significant boost. Algorand Price Prediction 2026: Navigating Market Dynamics Moving into 2026, the market might experience some consolidation or a slight correction after a potential bull run. However, the underlying fundamentals of Algorand could continue to strengthen. The focus will likely shift to the long-term viability of projects built on the network and Algorand’s ability to retain its user base and developer community. Challenges like increased competition from other layer-1 blockchains and potential regulatory headwinds could temper growth. Yet, Algorand’s focus on sustainability and compliance could position it favorably. Our Algorand price prediction for 2026 suggests a more stable, albeit potentially slower, growth trajectory: Minimum Price Average Price Maximum Price $0.40 $0.65 $0.90 This period will be crucial for Algorand to demonstrate its resilience and the enduring value proposition of its technology. Algorand Price Prediction 2027-2029: Sustained Momentum or Consolidation? By this time, the initial hype cycles may have settled, and the market will likely reward projects with tangible utility and robust ecosystems. The Algorand future hinges on continuous innovation and the ability to scale its network without compromising security or decentralization. We could see the ALGO price making significant strides, potentially testing higher resistance levels. However, if broader market conditions remain stagnant or if new, more efficient technologies emerge, Algorand could face headwinds. The competitive landscape is constantly evolving, and maintaining relevance requires relentless development and community engagement. Average price predictions for this period could hover around the $0.80 – $1.20 range, with peaks potentially higher depending on market euphoria. Algorand Price Prediction 2030: Will ALGO Price Hit the Coveted $1 Mark? The question on many investors’ minds: Can the ALGO price hit $1 by 2030? Our long-term Algorand price prediction suggests that reaching and even surpassing the $1 mark is certainly within the realm of possibility, provided several conditions are met. By 2030, the blockchain industry is expected to be significantly more mature and integrated into global commerce. Algorand’s early focus on enterprise solutions, sustainability, and compliance positions it well for this future. If Algorand becomes a backbone for national digital currencies, global supply chains, or a prominent platform for tokenized assets, the demand for ALGO would be immense. Minimum Price Average Price Maximum Price $0.70 $1.20 $2.50+ A conservative estimate places the average price around $1.20, with optimistic scenarios pushing it towards $2.50 or even higher. This relies on Algorand achieving significant market share and widespread utility, making it a critical infrastructure layer for the global digital economy. The key is consistent execution and adaptation to evolving technological and regulatory landscapes. Is Algorand a Good Investment? Weighing the Pros and Cons So, after all this analysis, is Algorand a good investment ? Like any cryptocurrency, ALGO comes with its own set of risks and rewards. Here’s a balanced perspective: Pros of Investing in Algorand: Strong Fundamentals: Built on robust academic research by Silvio Micali , Algorand boasts a technically sound and innovative Pure Proof-of-Stake consensus. Scalability and Speed: It offers high transaction throughput and instant finality, crucial for real-world applications. Cons and Risks: Market Competition: Algorand faces intense competition from other Layer 1 blockchains like Ethereum, Solana, and Avalanche. Conclusion: Unlocking Algorand’s Enduring Potential Our journey through the Algorand price prediction for 2025, 2026, and up to 2030 paints a picture of a promising, albeit volatile, future. Algorand’s strong fundamentals, commitment to sustainability, and enterprise-grade scalability provide a compelling argument for its long-term potential. However, the competitive landscape and inherent market risks demand caution. For those considering ALGO, understanding its technology, monitoring ecosystem growth, and staying informed about broader market trends are essential. The ALGO price analysis suggests that Algorand is well-positioned to play a significant role in the evolving digital economy, but its path will undoubtedly be marked by both challenges and triumphs. As the blockchain space matures, Algorand’s unique attributes could help it carve out a substantial niche, potentially rewarding patient investors. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) About Algorand Q1: What is Algorand (ALGO)? Q7: What is the role of the Algorand Foundation ? title: Avalanche’s Bold Ascent: Will AVAX Price Skyrocket Past $100 by 2030?
body: BitcoinWorld Avalanche’s Bold Ascent: Will AVAX Price Skyrocket Past $100 by 2030? The world of cryptocurrency is a dynamic arena, constantly evolving and presenting both immense opportunities and significant challenges. Among the many innovative projects vying for attention, Avalanche (AVAX) has emerged as a prominent player, distinguished by its unique architecture and ambitious vision. As investors and enthusiasts look to the future, a critical question resonates: what does the Avalanche price prediction hold for the coming years? Specifically, can the AVAX price realistically hit the coveted $100 mark by 2025, 2026, or even 2030? This comprehensive article will delve into the core technology, market dynamics, and expert forecasts to provide a clear perspective on Avalanche’s potential trajectory. Understanding Avalanche (AVAX): The Foundation of Future Growth Before we project its future value, it’s essential to grasp what Avalanche is and what problems it aims to solve. Avalanche is a layer-one blockchain platform designed for launching decentralized applications (dApps) and enterprise blockchain deployments. It boasts high transaction throughput, low latency, and robust security, positioning itself as a strong competitor to established networks like Ethereum. Key Features of Avalanche: Subnets: Avalanche’s innovative architecture allows for the creation of custom, application-specific blockchains called Subnets. These Subnets can have their own rules, fees, and validators, offering unparalleled flexibility and scalability. High Throughput: It can process thousands of transactions per second (TPS), significantly outperforming many older blockchains. Low Transaction Costs: Fees on Avalanche are generally lower and more predictable compared to some congested networks. Rapid Finality: Transactions are confirmed almost instantly, improving user experience for dApps. EVM Compatibility: The C-Chain (Contract Chain) is fully compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), making it easy for developers to migrate or deploy existing Ethereum dApps. These features collectively contribute to Avalanche’s appeal, laying a strong foundation for its potential growth and influencing its long-term crypto price forecast . AVAX Price History: A Journey Through Volatility Like most cryptocurrencies, AVAX has experienced significant price fluctuations since its inception. Launched in 2020, it quickly gained traction, reaching an all-time high (ATH) during the bull market of 2021. However, it has also navigated bear markets, experiencing corrections and periods of consolidation. Analyzing its past performance helps us understand its volatility and resilience, which are crucial factors in any Avalanche price prediction . Key Historical Milestones: Launch and Initial Growth: Post-ICO, AVAX saw steady growth as its ecosystem began to develop. 2021 Bull Run: Fueled by widespread crypto adoption and increasing interest in DeFi, AVAX surged to its ATH, demonstrating its potential for rapid appreciation. Market Corrections: Subsequent bear markets led to significant pullbacks, testing investor conviction but also presenting accumulation opportunities. This historical context is vital when considering future price movements, as past patterns often inform, though do not guarantee, future trends. Factors Influencing Avalanche Price Prediction: What Drives AVAX? Predicting the future price of any cryptocurrency, including AVAX, involves analyzing a multitude of factors. These range from technological advancements to broader market sentiment and regulatory shifts. Understanding these drivers is key to forming a realistic Avalanche price prediction . 1. Technological Innovation and Blockchain Scalability Avalanche’s commitment to continuous innovation is a primary driver of its value. The platform’s ability to offer superior blockchain scalability is a significant competitive advantage. As more users and applications onboard, the network’s capacity to handle increased transaction volumes without compromising speed or cost becomes paramount. Subnet Adoption: The success of Subnets in attracting new projects and enterprises will directly impact AVAX utility and demand. More Subnets mean more network activity and potentially more AVAX staking for validators. Protocol Upgrades: Ongoing development, such as improvements to consensus mechanisms or new features, can enhance the network’s capabilities and attract further investment. Interoperability: Expanding bridges and integrations with other blockchain networks can increase Avalanche’s reach and liquidity. The continuous enhancement of its core technology ensures that Avalanche remains a cutting-edge platform, crucial for its long-term viability and growth. 2. Ecosystem Growth and Decentralized Finance (DeFi) on Avalanche A thriving ecosystem of decentralized applications (dApps) and a robust presence in decentralized finance (DeFi) are critical for AVAX’s value proposition. The more projects, users, and capital flow into the Avalanche network, the greater the demand for AVAX, which is used for transaction fees, staking, and governance. Total Value Locked (TVL): The amount of capital locked in DeFi protocols on Avalanche is a key metric indicating ecosystem health. A rising TVL suggests growing user confidence and activity. New dApp Launches: Innovative new projects in areas like NFTs, gaming, lending, and DEXs attract users and liquidity. Institutional Adoption: Major financial institutions exploring Avalanche for asset tokenization or private blockchain solutions could significantly boost its credibility and demand. Strategic Partnerships: Collaborations with traditional companies or other crypto projects can expand Avalanche’s reach and utility. The vibrant and expanding DeFi landscape on Avalanche is a strong indicator of its potential for future appreciation. 3. Market Sentiment and Macroeconomic Conditions The broader cryptocurrency market and global economic conditions heavily influence the AVAX price . Bitcoin’s performance, regulatory news, interest rate changes, and investor risk appetite all play a role. Bitcoin’s Influence: As the largest cryptocurrency, Bitcoin’s price movements often dictate the direction of the altcoin market, including AVAX. Regulatory Clarity: Clear and favorable regulations can reduce uncertainty and encourage institutional investment, while adverse regulations can cause market downturns. Global Economy: Economic downturns or recessions can lead to reduced investment in riskier assets like cryptocurrencies. Investor Sentiment: FUD (Fear, Uncertainty, Doubt) or FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out) can lead to rapid price swings. These external factors are often unpredictable but must be considered when formulating a comprehensive crypto price forecast . 4. Competition and Adoption Avalanche operates in a highly competitive landscape, constantly vying with other layer-one blockchains like Ethereum, Solana, Cardano, and Polkadot. Its ability to attract and retain developers and users amidst this competition is vital. Developer Community: A strong and active developer community is crucial for building and maintaining a diverse ecosystem of dApps. User Experience: Ease of use, low fees, and fast transactions are key to attracting and retaining end-users. Marketing and Outreach: Effective communication of its unique value proposition helps Avalanche stand out. The continuous effort to differentiate and innovate is essential for Avalanche to maintain its competitive edge and drive adoption. Avalanche Price Prediction 2025, 2026 – 2030: Expert Insights and Forecasts Projecting cryptocurrency prices several years into the future is inherently speculative due to the market’s volatility and rapidly changing landscape. However, by analyzing the factors discussed above and leveraging insights from various analytical models, we can form educated estimations for the Avalanche price prediction . Here’s a generalized outlook based on current trends and expert analyses: Year Minimum AVAX Price Average AVAX Price Maximum AVAX Price 2025 $45 – $60 $70 – $90 $100 – $120 2026 $60 – $80 $90 – $110 $130 – $160 2027 $80 – $100 $110 – $140 $170 – $200 2028 $100 – $120 $140 – $170 $220 – $260 2029 $120 – $150 $170 – $200 $280 – $330 2030 $150 – $180 $200 – $250 $350 – $400+ Disclaimer: These are speculative forecasts based on current market trends, technological developments, and general expert consensus. Cryptocurrency markets are highly volatile, and actual prices may vary significantly. For 2025, reaching $100 for the AVAX price is considered achievable if market conditions remain favorable and Avalanche continues its ecosystem growth. By 2030, with sustained development, increasing institutional adoption, and a generally bullish crypto market, some analysts project AVAX could comfortably surpass $300, with ambitious targets even higher. Will AVAX Price Hit $100? Analyzing the Potential The question of whether the AVAX price will hit $100 is central to many investors’ considerations. Based on the analysis of its fundamentals and the projected market growth, reaching $100 is not just a possibility but a strong likelihood within the next few years, potentially even by 2025 or 2026 under optimal conditions. What Would it Take for AVAX to Reach $100? Increased Market Cap: For AVAX to reach $100, its market capitalization would need to grow significantly from its current levels. This requires a substantial influx of capital into the Avalanche ecosystem. Sustained Ecosystem Growth: The continuous launch of high-quality dApps, increased TVL in DeFi protocols, and broader user adoption are crucial. Institutional Interest: Major financial institutions using Avalanche for enterprise solutions or tokenized assets would provide a massive boost. Favorable Market Conditions: A general bull market for cryptocurrencies, driven by positive macroeconomic factors and regulatory clarity, would provide the tailwind needed. Technological Edge: Avalanche must maintain its competitive advantage in blockchain scalability and innovation to attract developers and users away from competing networks. Considering Avalanche’s strong technology, growing ecosystem, and active development team, the path to $100 seems plausible. The long-term crypto price forecast remains optimistic for well-established, technologically sound projects like Avalanche. Challenges and Risks for AVAX: Navigating the Hurdles While the outlook for Avalanche is generally positive, it’s crucial to acknowledge the challenges and risks that could impact its price trajectory. Potential Hurdles: Intense Competition: The layer-one blockchain space is crowded. Avalanche must continuously innovate to stay ahead of rivals. Regulatory Uncertainty: Evolving global cryptocurrency regulations could pose challenges, especially for DeFi protocols. Market Volatility: Cryptocurrencies are known for extreme price swings, which can lead to significant losses for investors. Security Risks: Like any blockchain, Avalanche is susceptible to potential hacks or exploits, which could damage trust and price. Centralization Concerns: While decentralized, any perceived concentration of power or influence could deter users. Prudent investors consider these risks as part of their due diligence for any Avalanche price prediction . Opportunities and Benefits: Why Consider AVAX? Despite the risks, Avalanche presents compelling opportunities for investors and users alike. Key Opportunities: Scalable Infrastructure: Its unique Subnet architecture offers a solution to the scalability trilemma, attracting a wide range of applications. Growing DeFi Ecosystem: The burgeoning landscape of decentralized finance (DeFi) on Avalanche offers high yields and innovative financial products. Developer-Friendly Environment: EVM compatibility makes it easy for Ethereum developers to migrate, fostering a rich dApp ecosystem. Institutional Interest: Avalanche is actively pursuing enterprise and institutional use cases, which could unlock significant capital. Strong Community and Development: An active community and a dedicated development team ensure continuous improvement and innovation. These benefits highlight why Avalanche is often considered a strong contender for long-term growth in the crypto space, supporting a positive crypto price forecast . Actionable Insights for Potential Investors For those considering an investment in AVAX, a strategic approach is essential. Here are some actionable insights: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Never invest based solely on predictions. Understand Avalanche’s technology, team, roadmap, and competitive landscape. Consider Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Instead of a lump sum investment, spread your purchases over time to mitigate the impact of market volatility. Diversify Your Portfolio: Don’t put all your capital into one asset. Balance your AVAX holdings with other cryptocurrencies and traditional investments. Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with Avalanche news, ecosystem developments, and broader market trends. This is crucial for refining your own Avalanche price prediction . Risk Management: Only invest what you can afford to lose. Cryptocurrency markets are highly speculative. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about Avalanche (AVAX) What is Avalanche (AVAX)? Avalanche is a layer-one blockchain platform that supports custom blockchain networks (Subnets) and decentralized applications. It aims to deliver high transaction throughput, low latency, and robust security, offering a scalable solution for various blockchain use cases. Is AVAX a good investment? Whether AVAX is a good investment depends on individual risk tolerance and investment goals. It has strong fundamentals, a growing ecosystem, and a dedicated development team, making it an attractive asset for many. However, like all cryptocurrencies, it carries inherent risks due to market volatility. Researching the Avalanche price prediction and its underlying technology is key. What drives the AVAX price? The AVAX price is driven by several factors including network adoption, ecosystem growth (especially in decentralized finance (DeFi) ), technological advancements like blockchain scalability , overall crypto market sentiment, and regulatory developments. Increased utility and demand for the Avalanche network tend to push the AVAX price higher. Where can I buy AVAX? AVAX can be purchased on major cryptocurrency exchanges. Popular options include Binance , Coinbase , Kraken, and KuCoin. Always use reputable exchanges and consider security measures like two-factor authentication. Who developed Avalanche? Avalanche was developed by Ava Labs , a company founded by Cornell University professor Emin Gün Sirer, along with Kevin Sekniqi and Maofan Yin. They are responsible for the initial research and development of the Avalanche protocol. What is the future of decentralized finance (DeFi) on Avalanche? The future of DeFi on Avalanche looks promising, with its scalable and low-cost infrastructure attracting numerous projects. The platform continues to expand its ecosystem of DEXs, lending protocols, stablecoins, and yield farming opportunities, aiming to become a leading hub for decentralized financial services. How does Avalanche ensure blockchain scalability ? Avalanche achieves high blockchain scalability primarily through its unique Subnet architecture. Subnets allow for the creation of multiple independent, application-specific blockchains that can operate in parallel, distributing the network load and preventing congestion on a single chain. This design allows the network to scale horizontally as more applications and users join. Summary: The Road Ahead for Avalanche Avalanche stands as a formidable contender in the blockchain space, offering a highly scalable, secure, and developer-friendly platform. Our comprehensive Avalanche price prediction for 2025, 2026, and 2030 suggests a significant upside potential, with the AVAX price having a strong chance to surpass $100 and potentially reach several hundred dollars by the end of the decade. This optimistic outlook is underpinned by its innovative Subnet architecture, growing presence in decentralized finance (DeFi) , and continuous improvements in blockchain scalability . While challenges and market volatility remain inherent to the crypto landscape, Avalanche’s fundamental strengths position it well for long-term growth. Investors should approach with careful research and a strategic mindset, but the potential for a bold ascent is clearly on the horizon. To learn more about the latest crypto markets trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Avalanche institutional adoption. title: 3 cryptocurrencies under $1 to buy next week
body: Historically, “sub-dollar” crypto assets attract retail flows during altcoin seasons, but in today’s market the focus is also on fundamentals: which tokens combine affordability with credible catalysts, without the risk of pump-and-dumps? Three stand out not just for next week, but to hold and buy for the long term, Cardano ( ADA ), TRON ( TRX ), and Stellar ( XLM ). Each sits in or near the top 15 by market capitalization, each has unique drivers, and each is priced to capture asymmetric upside if sentiment rotates back into altcoins. Cardano (ADA) At $0.65, Cardano has gained more than 86% over the past year, though it has given back nearly a fifth of its value in the past month. Despite that pullback, ADA has remained inside the global top 10, a sign of resilience through multiple cycles. ADA 1-year price chart. Source: Finbold The most telling datapoint is on-chain: wallets holding 100,000 or more ADA grew their balances by 2.1% last week, suggesting large holders are quietly building positions. Retail flows remain mixed, but that kind of accumulation points to long-term confidence. The regulatory backdrop has also shifted. Under the U.S. CLARITY Act, Cardano is formally recognised as a commodity alongside Bitcoin and Ethereum, removing a persistent source of uncertainty. On top of that, Grayscale has applied for a Cardano ETF, with Bloomberg assigning 75% odds of approval. If greenlit, it would open the door to institutional demand much like Bitcoin’s 2024 rally did. The challenge for ADA is turning technology into traction. Upgrades such as Hydra and x402 improve throughput and developer capacity, but adoption in AI and DeFi is still in its early stages. Investors are betting that if institutional inflows line up with real network utility, ADA can push back toward the $1 mark. TRON (TRX) TRON tells a very different story. Trading at $0.30, TRX is up 81% year-on-year and has fallen around 11% in the past month. Its 2024 all-time high of $0.44 is still some distance away, but the fundamentals are clear. TRX 1-year price chart. Source: Finbold The network now hosts over half of all Tether in circulation (around $78 billion) and processes more than $20 billion in daily stablecoin transfers. In Colombia, TRON accounts for an astonishing 95% of stablecoin payments, showing its real-world reach in emerging markets. On the DeFi side, new projects such as SunPerp DEX (launched Q3 2025) are adding depth, while TRON’s presence on Nasdaq-linked platforms signals its intent to bridge traditional and digital finance. Every transfer also burns TRX through transaction fees, gradually tightening supply. What makes TRON stand out is its consistency. It may not generate the same headlines as more experimental chains, but it has embedded itself into global payments infrastructure. For investors, that makes TRX one of the steadier sub-$1 assets in terms of demand and utility. Stellar (XLM) Stellar is priced near $0.32, up a remarkable 237% in the past year. Often moving in tandem with XRP, Stellar has also benefited from the momentum surrounding XRP’s ETF progress. XLM 1-year price chart. Source: Finbold The network’s next big moment is Protocol 24, due late 2025. The upgrade will bring zero-knowledge proofs (ZKPs) for private transactions as well as more efficient smart contract execution. If it follows the pattern of the 2023 Soroban upgrade, which triggered a seven-fold increase in total value locked, Stellar could see another wave of growth. The other piece of the puzzle is real-world asset tokenisation. Stellar’s RWA sector has reached $639 million in value (+26% month-on-month), driven by Franklin Templeton’s $446 million tokenised treasury fund. Competition, however, is fierce. Ripple’s CBDC partnerships mean Stellar must fight to retain relevance in the cross-border payments sector. Not every sub-dollar token deserves attention, but Cardano, TRON, and Stellar each combine low entry points with clear catalysts. The risks remain, but so do the opportunities for outsized returns when liquidity rotates back into altcoins. The post 3 cryptocurrencies under $1 to buy next week appeared first on Finbold .

title: Four.meme boosts defenses against bot trading with sliding fee experiment
body: Four.meme, the BNB Chain meme launchpad, is boosting its defenses against bots, encouraging organic trading through sliding fees when tokens launch. Four.meme launched a renewed form of its Fair Launch program to discourage the usage of bot trading. The BNB Chain meme launchpad has seen significant success while also trying to encourage organic traffic and limited bot usage. The new mechanism, titled X Mode, will introduce sliding fees in the first minutes after a token launches. In the first block after the launch, trading fees will be 100%, discouraging fast sniping and bot usage. 🚀 Fair Mode is now X Mode! Launching Oct 30, 8am UTC — now open to ALL wallets, bringing a smoother, smarter, and truly fair launch experience for every creator and trader on BNB Chain. ⚖️ 🔥 New Fee Dynamics: Transaction fee starts at 100% on Block 0, then gradually drops to… pic.twitter.com/hBmrte8iow — Four.meme-華語 (@fourdotmemezh) October 29, 2025 X Mode is still experimental, designed to test new mechanics, fairness models and their effects on bots. The goal is to keep real traders and communities engaged with Four.meme , by showing launches can be protected from early-entry traders. In the past, meme launches have often seen whales move in immediately to snipe the supply or trade quickly. Four.meme will instead introduce a waiting period, and if bots come in to trade early, they will lose all their winnings to fees. The fees will then be used in the launchpad’s liquidity program and token buybacks. Binance’s founder Changpeng Zhao praised the change. The current fee configuration is set by the platform and may be altered for future launches. Four.meme leads fee generation among meme platforms Meme tokens are still interesting for traders, as long as they have paths to users and liquidity inflow. Four.meme is one of the platforms with the highest fee production, up to $520M annualized. For the past week, it had the highest fee production , surpassing smaller launchpads. The platform is yet to catch up with Pump.fun, but has shown significant growth in fee generation. The launchpad already locks in $7.17M in value, offering small-scale activity and retail opportunities. The platform’s fees are still volatile, peaking above $4M per day. On some days, the launchpad produces less than $1M in fees. Four.meme is constantly innovating, testing new ways to launch and curate tokens, including protected names and offering liquidity to hand-picked projects. Four.meme boosts BNB token usage Most of the Four.meme tokens use a bonding curve against BNB, boosting the token usage. The native token of BNB Chain recovered to $1,114.15 based on overall Binance ecosystem activity. So far, Four.meme has sent 9,646 graduating tokens to PancakeSwap, recently achieving record volumes on the secondary market. Graduated Four.meme tokens are boosting activity on PancakeSwap, with most of the trading against BNB. | Source: Dune Analytics Most of the volumes are against BNB liquidity, though there are options for trading against USD1 . As a whole, the ecosystem of graduating tokens from Four.meme has grown to nearly $800M in valuation. The platform remains highly active in terms of fees and activity, though still lagging behind the valuations of previous meme seasons. The smartest crypto minds already read our newsletter. Want in? Join them .

title: Solana (SOL) Experienced a Major Pullback in This Area! Lost Its Place to These Two Altcoins!
body: Solana (SOL), Litecoin (LTC), and Hedera (HBAR) made their US debuts, and the anticipated ETFs have begun trading. While Solana has had great success with ETFs, it has lagged behind in another area. According to The Block, Solana's share of L1 fees has fallen to single digits. At this point, Hyperliquid (HYPE) and BNB Chain have attracted investor attention this year by increasing their share of the large Layer 1 (L1) fee market. In contrast, Solana's share of the main Tier 1 network fees fell from over 50% at the beginning of the year to just 9%. In the face of the fading decline, Hyperliquid's share rose to over 40%, while BNB Chain's share rose to around 20%. This shift has been attributed to multiple factors, including market demand, user preferences, and structural changes. The decline in Solana’s fee revenue was primarily attributed to the decline in memecoin trading on the network. Data suggests that the memecoin trading frenzy on Solana decreased sharply following the launch of the ‘TRUMP’ token earlier this year, which was the primary driver of the revenue decline. Memecoin trading once accounted for the majority of the Solana network's fee revenue, but activity has since declined significantly, reducing network traffic. In contrast, Hyperliquid and BNB Chain rapidly increased their fee share by strengthening their revenue structures focused on derivatives trading. Because derivatives trading generates higher fee revenue per transaction unit than memecoin trading, even a relatively small increase in user numbers led to a large increase in network revenue share. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Solana (SOL) Experienced a Major Pullback in This Area! Lost Its Place to These Two Altcoins!

title: Best Altcoins to Buy as XRP Defies Market at $2.62 – Here’s What Whales Are Accumulating

title: Web3 Payment Infrastructure: Pieverse Secures Crucial Funding to Accelerate x402b
body: BitcoinWorld Web3 Payment Infrastructure: Pieverse Secures Crucial Funding to Accelerate x402b The world of decentralized finance is constantly evolving, and at its heart lies the need for robust and efficient payment systems. This is where Web3 payment infrastructure comes into play, and a significant development has just emerged. Pieverse, a forward-thinking Web3 payment infrastructure startup, has recently announced a pivotal pre-Token Generation Event (TGE) investment from CMS Holdings. This crucial funding is set to accelerate the development and expansion of its innovative x402b payment protocol, a move that promises to reshape how we think about digital transactions within the Web3 ecosystem. What Makes Pieverse’s x402b Protocol a Game-Changer for Web3 Payment Infrastructure? Pieverse’s x402b protocol isn’t just another payment system; it’s an enhanced model designed to address key pain points in current Web3 transactions. Building upon the foundational x402 protocol, x402b introduces a suite of features that significantly improve user experience and operational efficiency. Imagine conducting transactions without worrying about gas fees — that’s one of the core benefits this new Web3 payment infrastructure offers. Here’s a closer look at what makes x402b stand out: Gasless Payments: Say goodbye to unpredictable and often high gas fees. x402b allows for transactions where users don’t directly pay for gas, making microtransactions and frequent payments more viable and cost-effective. On-Chain Receipts: Every transaction generates an immutable, verifiable receipt directly on the blockchain. This provides unparalleled transparency and proof of payment, essential for both individual users and businesses. Auditable Verification: The protocol is built with auditable verification features, ensuring that all transactions can be easily tracked and confirmed. This is vital for regulatory compliance and fostering trust in the digital economy. These enhancements position x402b as a core piece of infrastructure for regulatory-compliant financial automation within Web3. Its design also makes it highly suitable for integration with artificial intelligence applications, opening up new possibilities for automated and intelligent financial services. How Will This Pre-TGE Funding Propel Pieverse’s Vision for Web3 Payment Infrastructure? The investment from CMS Holdings is a significant vote of confidence in Pieverse’s vision and its x402b protocol. This latest round brings Pieverse’s cumulative funding to an impressive $10 million, underscoring the growing belief in the potential of advanced Web3 payment infrastructure . Such funding is not merely about capital; it’s about strategic partnership and accelerating growth. With the support of CMS Holdings, Pieverse is set to channel these resources primarily into expanding its on-chain verification layer. This expansion is critical for several reasons: Enhanced Security: A robust verification layer strengthens the security of transactions, protecting users and ensuring data integrity. Broader Adoption: Improved verification capabilities make the protocol more attractive to enterprises and regulated industries seeking compliant Web3 solutions. Scalability: Expanding this layer is essential for handling a larger volume of transactions as the protocol gains wider adoption, ensuring smooth and efficient operations. This strategic focus highlights Pieverse’s commitment to building a reliable and scalable foundation for the future of Web3 payments. The investment will enable the team to innovate faster and bring their cutting-edge solutions to a wider audience, solidifying their position in the competitive Web3 landscape. What Does Pieverse’s Advancement Mean for the Broader Web3 Ecosystem? The development of x402b and the significant funding secured by Pieverse have implications far beyond the company itself. It signals a maturation of the Web3 payment infrastructure space, moving towards more user-friendly, compliant, and integrated solutions. As Web3 technologies become more mainstream, the need for seamless and secure payment protocols will only intensify. Pieverse’s focus on regulatory compliance and auditable verification is particularly noteworthy. This approach is crucial for bridging the gap between traditional finance and the decentralized world, potentially paving the way for greater institutional adoption of Web3 solutions. Moreover, the integration capabilities with AI applications suggest a future where financial automation is not only efficient but also intelligent and adaptive. This initiative could set a new standard for payment protocols on the BNB Chain and beyond, encouraging other developers to prioritize features that enhance security, transparency, and user experience. Ultimately, it contributes to building a more robust, accessible, and trustworthy digital economy for everyone. Concluding Thoughts: The Future is Bright for Web3 Payment Infrastructure Pieverse’s successful pre-TGE funding round marks a pivotal moment for the development of the x402b protocol and the broader Web3 payment infrastructure . By focusing on crucial features like gasless payments, on-chain receipts, and auditable verification, Pieverse is not just building a product; it’s laying down foundational elements for a more efficient, compliant, and intelligent Web3 financial system. This investment from CMS Holdings underscores the immense potential of Pieverse to drive innovation and facilitate the mainstream adoption of decentralized finance. As x402b continues to expand its on-chain verification layer, we can anticipate a future where Web3 payments are as seamless and reliable as traditional methods, if not more so, paving the way for a truly automated and transparent digital economy. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the x402b payment protocol? A1: The x402b payment protocol is an enhanced version of the x402 protocol developed by Pieverse. It’s a Web3 payment infrastructure solution based on the BNB Chain, featuring gasless payments, on-chain receipts, and auditable verification for regulatory-compliant financial automation. Q2: Who invested in Pieverse’s pre-TGE funding round? A2: Pieverse secured its pre-Token Generation Event (TGE) investment from CMS Holdings, contributing to a cumulative funding total of $10 million. Q3: What are the key benefits of x402b for users? A3: Users benefit from gasless payments, meaning they don’t directly incur transaction fees. They also receive transparent on-chain receipts and benefit from auditable verification, enhancing trust and clarity in their Web3 transactions. Q4: How does x402b support regulatory compliance? A4: x402b is designed with features like on-chain receipts and auditable verification, which are crucial for meeting regulatory requirements. These features provide the transparency and traceability needed for compliant financial automation in Web3. Q5: What is Pieverse’s main focus with the new funding? A5: With the new funding, Pieverse will primarily focus on expanding its on-chain verification layer. This expansion aims to enhance security, facilitate broader adoption, and improve the scalability of the x402b payment protocol. Q6: Can x402b be used with AI applications? A6: Yes, Pieverse explicitly stated that the x402b protocol is suitable for artificial intelligence applications, indicating its potential for integration into intelligent and automated financial systems within Web3. If you found this insight into Pieverse’s groundbreaking advancements in Web3 payment infrastructure informative, consider sharing it with your network! Help spread the word about the exciting innovations shaping the future of decentralized finance. title: BitMine Adds $113 Million in Ethereum to Corporate Treasury, Onchain Data Shows
body: BitMine Immersion Technologies has reportedly added 27,316 ETH, worth roughly $113 million, to its corporate treasury this week, according to blockchain data shared by Lookonchain via Arkham Intelligence. Key Takeaways: BitMine added 27,316 ETH worth $113 million, boosting its total Ethereum holdings to over 3.3 million ETH ($13.2B). The firm is now the largest corporate holder of Ethereum and the second-largest crypto treasury after Michael Saylor’s Strategy. CEO Tom Lee sees Ethereum as a “neutral chain” poised for institutional adoption, while cautioning that Bitcoin remains vulnerable to major market swings. The transfer allegedly came from custody platform BitGo, though the company has yet to confirm the transaction. BitMine Becomes Largest Corporate Holder of Ethereum With $13.2B Treasury Earlier this week, BitMine announced its total Ethereum holdings surpassed 3.3 million ETH, valued at around $13.2 billion. This solidifies BitMine’s position as the largest Ethereum-holding corporation and the second-largest crypto treasury overall, behind Michael Saylor’s Strategy. Led by Fundstrat co-founder Tom Lee, BitMine has outlined an ambitious goal of accumulating 5% of Ethereum’s total supply, positioning itself as a long-term backer of the blockchain’s expanding financial ecosystem. The firm counts heavyweight institutional supporters such as Ark Invest’s Cathie Wood, Bill Miller III, Digital Currency Group, Founders Fund, Galaxy Digital, Kraken, and Pantera Capital. Lee has been vocal about Ethereum’s potential, describing it as a “truly neutral chain” likely to win favor among Wall Street institutions and US policymakers. Tom Lee( @fundstrat )'s #Bitmine just bought another 27,316 $ETH ($113M) and currently holds 3.34M $ETH ($13.3B). https://t.co/STJqKkdLMx https://t.co/EWFNQ8CMI9 pic.twitter.com/LjydR5CXVp — Lookonchain (@lookonchain) October 29, 2025 At press time, Ethereum (ETH) has fallen 2.36% over the past 24 hours, trading around $4,000, according to The Block’s market data. Last week, Lee also warned that Bitcoin’s volatility isn’t gone , and it could still fall by as much as half its value. His comments come amid rising optimism that Bitcoin’s price swings have softened thanks to spot Bitcoin ETFs and increased institutional participation. However, Lee cautioned that Bitcoin continues to move in tandem with traditional markets, and tends to amplify those moves. “The stock market has more frequent 25% drawdowns,” he said. “So if the S&P is down 20%, Bitcoin could be down 40%.” Lee added that while the broader economy has matured in recent years, Bitcoin’s correlation with equities means sharp corrections are still likely. Tom Lee Doubles Down on Ethereum as DAT Bubble Shows Signs of Bursting As reported, Lee has reaffirmed his bullish stance on Ethereum (ETH) , revealing a $1.5 billion purchase following last weekend’s market crash. Despite warning that digital asset treasuries (DATs) are trading below their net asset value (NAV), suggesting a potential bubble burst, Lee told Fortune he views the pullback as a long-term buying opportunity. Lee’s move was mirrored by BitMine Immersion Technologies, which accumulated 379,271 ETH worth roughly $1.5 billion across three major purchases this week, according to data from Arkham Intelligence. The mining firm now holds over 3 million ETH, or 2.5% of the total supply, making it one of the largest corporate holders of Ether. BitMine reportedly aims to control 5% of all ETH in circulation, positioning itself as a key player in the Ethereum ecosystem. The post BitMine Adds $113 Million in Ethereum to Corporate Treasury, Onchain Data Shows appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Norway Sees 30% Surge in Crypto Tax Reporting — $4B in Digital Assets Declared
body: Norway has reported a sharp rise in cryptocurrency tax declarations, with more than 73,000 people disclosing digital asset holdings in their 2024 tax returns, a 30% increase from the previous year, according to new figures from the Norwegian Tax Administration (Skatteetaten). The surge represents the largest year-on-year increase in crypto reporting since records began and signals growing transparency in the country’s digital asset market. Source: Skatteetaten The total value of declared cryptocurrency holdings more than doubled to NOK 40.3 billion ($3.9 billion), the highest figure ever reported. Sevenfold Growth in Crypto Declarations — What’s Behind Norway’s Tax Turnaround? Tax Director Nina Schanke Funnemark said the increase reflects the success of recent measures aimed at encouraging voluntary compliance. “It is gratifying that more people are reporting that they own cryptocurrency and in this way ensuring that the tax is correct,” she said. “We have taken several measures in recent years to increase this number, and we see that these measures are having an effect.” In 2019, fewer than 10,000 Norwegians reported owning crypto assets. That number has now grown more than sevenfold. The increase comes after the tax agency began sending out digital reminders, known as dults, to taxpayers who may own crypto or virtual assets but failed to declare them. The latest data also reflects rising market prices throughout 2024, which significantly boosted the total declared value of digital holdings. Skatteetaten noted that crypto gains reached NOK 5.5 billion, while reported losses totaled NOK 2.9 billion for the same period. Under Norwegian law, cryptocurrency is treated as a capital asset, not a currency, meaning that profits and losses from trading are subject to capital gains tax. Source: Skatteetaten The current tax rate is a flat 22%, and the same rate applies to deductions for realized losses. Gains are triggered when digital assets are sold, swapped, or used to pay for goods or services. For example, if an investor sells 1 ETH that was purchased for 20,000 Norwegian kroner and sells it later for 50,000 kroner, the 30,000-kroner profit is taxed at 22%, resulting in a 6,600-kroner liability. FIFO to Wealth Tax: How Norway Calculates and Enforces Crypto Obligations The Norwegian system uses a First-In, First-Out (FIFO) method to calculate the cost basis of crypto sales, assuming the first coins bought are the first ones sold. In addition to capital gains tax, crypto holders must declare their digital assets as part of their net wealth each year. Wealth above NOK 1.7 million is subject to Norway’s wealth tax, with rates that vary based on income and municipality. Those earning from mining, staking, or airdrops must report such proceeds as regular income, which is taxed at a progressive rate depending on the taxpayer’s income level. Source: Skatteetaten Norway’s crypto taxation system relies heavily on self-reporting, meaning individuals are responsible for disclosing their own crypto activity through Skatteetaten’s online portal. Taxpayers must calculate their holdings, trades, and income in Norwegian kroner using the exchange rate on the transaction date. Failing to declare these assets can result in additional tax penalties or audits. Funnemark said many first-time filers tend to report small sums, but authorities have also uncovered large undeclared amounts through audits. Those who correct their declarations voluntarily can amend filings up to three years back to avoid penalties, provided the correction occurs before an official audit is initiated. How Far Will Norway Go to Keep Crypto in Check? The report added that from 2026, Norway’s oversight will expand further under new third-party reporting rules. Exchanges and wallet providers operating in the country will be required to report user data directly to Skatteetaten, giving the tax authority more accurate insight into residents’ crypto activity. “This is an important step towards more correct taxation of digital assets,” Tax Director Nina Schanke Funnemark said. “With this development, we will have a much better overview of who owns crypto assets, both in Norway and abroad.” Taxes collected from cryptocurrency activity in Norway flow into the country’s general government revenue, helping to fund public infrastructure, education, healthcare, and social services. Crypto-related tax income is treated no differently from that derived from stocks or other capital investments. The latest rise in declarations coincides with a broader regulatory tightening in Norway’s digital asset sector. In 2025, the government moved to align national law with the European Union’s Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA) regulation , introducing licensing requirements for crypto service providers and stronger consumer protection rules. A temporary ban on new high-energy crypto mining projects was also announced in June, citing environmental concerns and energy conservation priorities. Norway government announces a temporary ban on new power-hungry crypto mining centers. #CryptoMining #Norway https://t.co/3MCBUdEqOc — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) June 20, 2025 Meanwhile, the government’s ethics watchdog, which oversees the $1.8 trillion Government Pension Fund Global, in 2024 said it was preparing to investigate crypto and gambling firms in its portfolio over money laundering risks. The council’s findings could lead to divestment from some companies, reflecting Norway’s cautious but active approach to the crypto sector. The post Norway Sees 30% Surge in Crypto Tax Reporting — $4B in Digital Assets Declared appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: DeFi AI Infrastructure: Infinit’s Revolutionary Partnership with Virtual Protocol
body: BitcoinWorld DeFi AI Infrastructure: Infinit’s Revolutionary Partnership with Virtual Protocol Imagine a future where your financial transactions are not just automated, but intelligently managed by AI agents, seamlessly and securely. This groundbreaking vision is rapidly becoming a reality as Infinit (IN) steps forward to provide essential DeFi AI infrastructure through a strategic partnership with Virtual Protocol (VIRTUAL). Revolutionizing Financial Automation: Infinit’s Core Contribution Infinit has made a significant announcement that is set to reshape the landscape of decentralized finance. The protocol will provide DeFi agents and critical data sources directly through Virtual Protocol’s innovative Agent Commerce Protocol (ACP). This collaboration is not just an integration; it is a fundamental enhancement of the underlying DeFi AI infrastructure that powers autonomous financial operations. Specifically, this partnership means that over 17,000 AI agents will gain the ability to utilize Infinit’s robust DeFi infrastructure. This access is crucial, as it empowers these agents with the tools they need to perform complex financial tasks autonomously. Furthermore, Infinit has confirmed that this protocol will facilitate automatic financial transactions between AI agents, a monumental step towards truly intelligent and self-executing finance. Unlocking New Possibilities: What Does This Mean for AI Agents and DeFi? The implications of this integration are profound, particularly for the future of automated finance. By enabling direct stablecoin payments following its x402 upgrade, Infinit is not only simplifying transactions but also solidifying the practical utility of its DeFi AI infrastructure . This move addresses a critical need for stability and efficiency within the often-volatile cryptocurrency space. Consider the benefits this brings: Enhanced Efficiency: AI agents can execute trades, manage portfolios, and conduct payments without human intervention, drastically reducing processing times. Increased Accessibility: A wider range of AI-driven financial applications can emerge, making sophisticated DeFi strategies more accessible. Seamless Transactions: The ability to conduct direct stablecoin payments ensures predictable value and reduces conversion complexities. This development essentially transforms how AI interacts with financial markets, paving the way for a more dynamic and responsive DeFi ecosystem. Strategic Vision: Powering the Next Generation of DeFi AI Infrastructure The collaboration between Infinit and Virtual Protocol is more than just a technical integration; it represents a strategic alignment aimed at accelerating the adoption and capabilities of AI within decentralized finance. Virtual Protocol’s Agent Commerce Protocol provides the framework for AI agents to interact and transact, and Infinit’s contribution supplies the essential financial plumbing. This partnership creates a powerful synergy: For Virtual Protocol: It gains robust, battle-tested DeFi capabilities for its extensive network of AI agents. For Infinit: It significantly expands its reach and utility, becoming a foundational layer for a new wave of AI-driven financial services. The vision is clear: to build a scalable, secure, and intelligent financial environment where AI agents can operate with unprecedented autonomy and efficiency, fundamentally advancing the overall DeFi AI infrastructure . Navigating the Future: Opportunities and Challenges for DeFi AI Infrastructure While the opportunities are immense, it’s also important to consider the road ahead. The rapid evolution of DeFi AI infrastructure brings with it both exciting prospects and inherent challenges. Ensuring the security and integrity of automated financial transactions remains paramount, requiring continuous innovation in smart contract auditing and network resilience. Moreover, regulatory landscapes are still catching up with these technological advancements. However, these challenges also present opportunities for pioneering solutions and setting industry standards. As Infinit and Virtual Protocol push these boundaries, they are not just building technology; they are helping to define the future of finance. In conclusion, Infinit’s commitment to providing robust DeFi AI infrastructure through Virtual Protocol marks a pivotal moment for the convergence of artificial intelligence and decentralized finance. This partnership promises to unlock unprecedented levels of automation, efficiency, and innovation, setting the stage for a new era of intelligent financial services. The integration of over 17,000 AI agents with Infinit’s capabilities, especially with the upcoming stablecoin payments via the x402 upgrade, signals a powerful shift towards a more autonomous and sophisticated financial ecosystem. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Infinit (IN)? Infinit (IN) is a protocol focused on providing essential DeFi infrastructure, including agents and data sources, to facilitate automated financial transactions within the decentralized finance ecosystem. What is Virtual Protocol (VIRTUAL) and its Agent Commerce Protocol (ACP)? Virtual Protocol (VIRTUAL) is a platform that hosts and enables interaction for a large network of AI agents. Its Agent Commerce Protocol (ACP) is the framework that allows these AI agents to engage in commerce and transactions. How will AI agents utilize Infinit’s DeFi infrastructure? AI agents will use Infinit’s DeFi infrastructure to access data, execute automatic financial transactions, manage assets, and facilitate direct stablecoin payments, all within the decentralized finance environment. What is the x402 upgrade? The x402 upgrade is an upcoming enhancement to the Infinit protocol that will enable direct stablecoin payments, further streamlining and securing automated financial transactions for AI agents. What are the key benefits of AI agents performing automatic financial transactions? The key benefits include increased efficiency, reduced human error, 24/7 market access, faster transaction speeds, and the ability to execute complex financial strategies autonomously. If you found this insight into the future of decentralized finance and artificial intelligence compelling, don’t keep it to yourself! Share this article with your network and join the conversation about how Infinit and Virtual Protocol are shaping the next generation of financial technology. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping DeFi AI infrastructure innovation. title: Belarusians can now buy Geely cars with Bitcoin at local dealership
body: Cars produced by the Chinese automaker Geely and its local subsidiary in Belarus can now be purchased using cryptocurrencies. Customers will be getting the same prices and promotions, with the added benefit of using digital coins to make the payment through instant conversion to Belarusian fiat. Cryptocurrencies accepted for Geely and Belgee cars in Belarus A car dealership in Minsk, the capital city of Belarus, has launched a new service allowing buyers to spend cryptocurrency on their new vehicle. Tochka, the auto retailer, is offering the alternative payment option in collaboration with WhiteBird, one of the oldest licensed crypto platforms in the country. Belarusian media describes the initiative as the first case of integrating crypto payments in the Eastern European nation’s automotive market. Buyers can choose any of the models offered by Geely , as well as Belgee, a joint venture controlled by the Chinese automotive conglomerate and the Belarusian state-owned BelAZ. The latter is one of the world’s biggest manufacturers of large dump trucks and other heavy transport equipment for the mining and construction industries. Speaking to the Belarusian news outlet Office Life, a Tochka representative emphasized: “This is not an experiment or a promotion, but a full-fledged service operating within the legal framework of Belarus.” The spokesperson also noted Tochka embarked on the project to “meet the wishes of the modern generation of car drivers.” Crypto payments made possible through conversion to fiat Buyers can place crypto orders without even visiting the dealer’s office, as payments are processed online. They only need to contact Tochka and confirm the final price in Belarusian rubles. Customers are then transferred to a WhiteBird employee who helps them with exchanging their crypto into fiat at a preferential rate set specifically for the project. Once the transaction is finalized, the vehicle can be picked up at the showroom or delivered to any address in the territory of Belarus. Prices for crypto owners are the same as those for clients paying with rubles. They will also enjoy the same discounts for Geely or Belgee cars. The dealership expects to sell up to 10% of the cars it offers from the two brands for cryptocurrency under the newly implemented scheme. Belarus reacts to growing popularity of cryptocurrency Crypto payments have been gaining traction in Belarus, a close economic and political ally of both China and Russia, especially under Western sanctions that have restricted the access of its citizens and companies to traditional financial channels. The trend was recently highlighted by Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko, who noted that the volume of external payments through cryptocurrency exchanges reached a record $1.7 billion in the first seven months of the year. Belarus is a regional leader in terms of efforts to regulate digital assets. It legalized crypto business for residents of the Belarus Hi Tech Park ( HTP ) in 2018, with a presidential decree signed by Lukashenko in late 2017. This year, the country’s long-term leader urged government officials and regulatory bodies in Minsk to swiftly update the national framework in order to catch up with the industry. Speaking at a conference devoted to the development of the digital token economy in early September, he was quoted by the official BelTA news agency as stating: “The task of the state in these conditions is to determine understandable, transparent rules of the game and mechanisms for control in this sphere.” WhiteBird, car dealer Tochka’s partner for the crypto payments feature, is registered at the HTP hub and is arguably the first coin trading platform to obtain a Belarusian license. In September, the exchange also helped Wildberries, Russia’s largest online retailer, to offer its Belarusian customers the option to pay with major cryptocurrencies, as reported by Cryptopolitan. The Russian e-commerce giant now accepts Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and the U.S. dollar-pegged stablecoin Tether (USDT), among others, through an integration with WhiteBird in Belarus.
